name: DiscoRat
description:
Disco Rat

Make  disco rat dance by pressing different keys on the beat.!
Consecutive key presses on the beat may lead to a combo, did you get all 3?  Well that's it, have fun!

[Combo Spoilers]

Down/ Left/ Right

Down/ Right/ Down/ Right

Left/ Up/ Right/ Down

Controls

W/ A/ S/ D   or   Arrow keys

Team

Sound - Davide A. Chiarella
